subject: [HR-887(Revised: Office Expansion Project Team)] Notice of office expansion.
msg:
Happy new year everyone,

The office is scheduled to expand on February 4th. You will be notified if you have to change stations on January 25th.

Thank you for your cooperation,
-HR

reply.subject: Re: [Github] Logout page
reply.msg: I'm going to try location.reload for now, but I am wondering if we can just reload the components without having to reload the data.

subject: [Github] Logout page
msg:
Once the user logs out,
the app should be refreshed and redirected to the sign in page.

subject: [dev]Postfix 3.1.12 / 3.2.9 / 3.3.4 / 3.4.5
msg: Testing Really long message: Blow the man down sloop jack Barbary Coast bowsprit gangway weigh anchor capstan careen yardarm salmagundi gunwalls parley Sail ho Jolly Roger topmast gaff run a rig long clothes yo-ho-ho. Landlubber or just lubber salmagundi take a caulk wench jack lugsail list clipper coxswain bilge water schooner hail-shot stern cutlass lugger overhaul reef hempen halter brig Pirate Round. Arr heave down lee spyglass hulk hardtack yard transom loaded to the gunwalls Plate Fleet no prey, no pay Nelsons folly blow the man down heave to belaying pin furl bounty gaff schooner scuttle. Take a caulk walk the plank squiffy prow six pounders bilge rum stern maroon bilge water barque crow's nest barkadeer spirits Privateer swing the lead mizzen belay splice the main brace tack. Brig hang the jib gabion American Main avast aft snow ho Sink me gibbet cackle fruit yo-ho-ho fathom blow the man down draft scourge of the seven seas lanyard Nelsons folly keelhaul quarter. Yawl hail-shot strike colors scourge of the seven seas scuppers smartly sheet league lugger mutiny belaying pin scurvy topmast measured fer yer chains rigging case shot quarterdeck lugsail trysail Jolly Roger. Chain Shot Nelsons folly capstan black jack bilged on her anchor ahoy run a rig Corsair driver scurvy main sheet ye Brethren of the Coast grog blossom pirate boom boatswain long boat hogshead hempen halter.
